content.text:
[@kas](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519) In case you're still interested, I'm working on an [SSB Markdown parser](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-markdown/pull/24) and it'll be trivial to add abbreviations and definition list syntax:

- https://github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-abbr
- https://github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it-deflist
